text: Approval for several new lead models:  the SWEET PICOTIP(TM) Rx Models 4050, 4051, 4052, 4053, 4054, and 4055 Steroid Eluting, Positive-Fixation, Porous Tip Pacing Leads.  These devices are indicated for chornic pacing and sensing of the atrium and/or ventricle when used with a compatible pulse generator.
